item.description:
Let's take Rock Spot up by it's offer and climber there for 10 bucks all night long! Just tell the folks at the front desk that you're climbing with the Meetup and you'll get the discount.

Rock Spot is easily accessible by public transportation.
Please check out the following link for directions: http://www.rockspotcl...

We will typically wait until about 7:15pm for everybody to arrive and team up. If you happen to come after we already hit the walls, please find me climbing.

Just look out for curly hair and an interesting sounding accent. ;o)
Or simply ask at the front desk for Lilly.

Please note: You will have to pass a belay test if you are an experienced climber but new to the gym. You can take a belay test when you get there.
If you have never climbed before, you have to take a class at Rock Spot. Please call the gym in advance to make arrangements to take the class. You can use the message board on this meetup to find other people that want to take the class.


See ya soon!

Climb away,
Lilly
item.how_to_find_us: Ask for Lilly at the front desk
item.name: Rocking Rock Spot!
